ThingDef.label: Flesh Adapter
ThingDef.description: This implant consists of nanites that shape the appearance of the host to reflect a more attractive form.

ThingDef.label: Networked Coagulator
ThingDef.description: A coagulator that has been heavily augmented to work with a specific glitternet network. Most of the internal processing has been removed to fit more chemicals and better deployment systems. This implant goes into standby when no network is detected.

ThingDef.label: Networked Healing Enhancer
ThingDef.description: A Healing enhancer that has been heavily augmented to work with a specific glitternet network. The original nanomachines have been replaced with smaller networked ones this allows for more nanomachines in less space, resulting in higher performance. This implant goes into standby when no network is detected.

ThingDef.label: Panzer Skin Gland
ThingDef.description: This implant is a Hybrid of the Flesh adapter and the empire's Stone skin gland. (further discription later)
